mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT oe.order_id FROM sftc_order o, sftc_order_express oe WHERE o.id = oe.order_id AND o.region_type = 'REGION_NATION' AND oe.reserve_time IS NOT NULL AND oe.reserve_time != ''
SELECT DISTINCT oe.order_id FROM sftc_order o, sftc_order_express oe WHERE o.id = oe.order_id AND o.region_type = 'REGION_NATION' AND (oe.state = 'WAIT_FILL' OR oe.state = 'ALREADY_FILL')

SELECT DISTINCT oe.order_id FROM sftc_order o, sftc_order_express oe WHERE o.id = oe.order_id AND (1=(SELECT COUNT(order_id) FROM sftc_order_express WHERE order_id = o.id)) AND ( (oe.state = 'WAIT_FILL' OR oe.state ='ALREADY_FILL' ) OR (o.region_type = 'REGION_SAME' AND oe.state = 'PAYING') )
